text: The men's double sculls competition at the 2018 World Rowing Championships in Plovdiv took place at the Plovdiv Regatta Venue. ==Schedule== The schedule was as follows: {| class="wikitable" ! Date ! Time ! Round |- | Sunday 9 September 2018 || 11:45 || Heats |- | rowspan=2|Thursday 13 September 2018 || 08:45 || Repechages |- | 16:05 || Semifinals C/D |- | Friday 14 September 2018 || 09:19 || Semifinals A/B |- | Saturday 15 September 2018 || 16:13 || Final D |- | rowspan=3|Sunday 16 September 2018 || 09:54 || Final C |- | 10:54 || Final B |- | style=background:lemonchiffon| 12:33 ||style=background:lemonchiffon| Final A |} All times are Eastern European Summer Time (UTC+3) ==Results== ===Heats=== Heat winners advanced directly to the A/B semifinals. The remaining boats were sent to the repechages. ====Heat 1==== {|class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" !Rank !Rowers !Country !Time !Notes |-bgcolor=ccffcc | 1 | align="left"|John Storey Chris
